short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This simple extension brings back the apps page in new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you want Chrome to open up the Apps page every time you open up a new tab? This is a simple extension that does just that.

Source is available at https://github.com/keewooi/chrome-goto-apps
